verses.text:
The \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* was upon me, and carried me \w out|strong="H3318"\w* in the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and set me \w down|strong="H5117"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w valley|strong="H1237"\w* which \add was\add* \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*,

And caused me to \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* by them round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*: and, behold, \add there were\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* in the \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w valley|strong="H1237"\w*; and, lo, \add they were\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w dry|strong="H3002"\w*.\f + \fr 37.2 \ft valley: or, champaign\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, can these \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*? And I \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w*.

Again he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* upon these \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, O ye \w dry|strong="H3002"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* unto these \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*; Behold, I will cause \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* to \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into you, and ye shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*:

And I will \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \w sinews|strong="H1517"\w* upon you, and will bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* upon you, and \w cover|strong="H7159"\w* you with \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* in you, and ye shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*; and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

So I \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* as I was \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*: and as I \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w*, there was a \w noise|strong="H6963"\w*, and behold a \w shaking|strong="H7494"\w*, and the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* came \w together|strong="H7126"\w*, \w bone|strong="H6106"\w* to his \w bone|strong="H6106"\w*.

And when I \w beheld|strong="H7200"\w*, lo, the \w sinews|strong="H1517"\w* and the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* upon them, and the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w covered|strong="H7159"\w* them \w above|strong="H4605"\w*: but \add there was\add* no \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* in them.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he unto me, \w Prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* unto the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; \w Come|strong="H0935"\w* from the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w winds|strong="H7307"\w*, O \w breath|strong="H7307"\w*, and \w breathe|strong="H5301"\w* upon these \w slain|strong="H2026"\w*, that they may \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.\f + \fr 37.9 \ft wind: or, breath\f*

So I \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* as he \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* me, and the \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into them, and they \w lived|strong="H2421"\w*, and stood \w up|strong="H5975"\w* upon their \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, an \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w*.

¶ Then he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, these \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* are the whole \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: behold, they \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Our \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* are \w dried|strong="H3001"\w*, and our \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* is \w lost|strong="H0006"\w*: we are cut \w off|strong="H1504"\w* for our parts.

Therefore \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, O my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, I will \w open|strong="H6605"\w* your \w graves|strong="H6913"\w*, and cause you to come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of your \w graves|strong="H6913"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* you into the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when I have \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* your \w graves|strong="H6913"\w*, O my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and brought you \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of your \w graves|strong="H6913"\w*,

And shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* in you, and ye shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, and I shall \w place|strong="H3240"\w* you in your own \w land|strong="H0127"\w*: then shall ye \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*, and \w performed|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
¶ The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came again unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Moreover, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thee \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w stick|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w write|strong="H3789"\w* upon it, For \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* his \w companions|strong="H2270"\w*: then \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w stick|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w write|strong="H3789"\w* upon it, For \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, the \w stick|strong="H6086"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and \add for\add* all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* his \w companions|strong="H2270"\w*:

And \w join|strong="H7126"\w* them \w one|strong="H0259"\w* to \w another|strong="H0259"\w* into \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w stick|strong="H6086"\w*; and they shall become \w one|strong="H0259"\w* in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

¶ And when the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Wilt thou not \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* us what thou \add meanest\add* by these?

\w Say|strong="H1696"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w stick|strong="H6086"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, which \add is\add* in the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* his \w fellows|strong="H2270"\w*, and will \w put|strong="H5414"\w* them with him, \add even\add* with the \w stick|strong="H6086"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w make|strong="H6213"\w* them \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w stick|strong="H6086"\w*, and they shall be \w one|strong="H0259"\w* in mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.
¶ And the \w sticks|strong="H6086"\w* whereon thou \w writest|strong="H3789"\w* shall be in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* before their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

And \w say|strong="H1696"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from \w among|strong="H0996"\w* the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, whither they be \w gone|strong="H1980"\w*, and will \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* them on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them into their own \w land|strong="H0127"\w*:

And I will \w make|strong="H6213"\w* them \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* shall be \w king|strong="H4428"\w* to them all: and they shall \w be|strong="H5750"\w* no more \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, neither shall they be \w divided|strong="H2673"\w* into \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* any more at all:

Neither shall they \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* themselves any more with their \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*, nor with their detestable \w things|strong="H8251"\w*, nor with any of their \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*: but I will \w save|strong="H3467"\w* them out of all their \w dwellingplaces|strong="H4186"\w*, wherein they have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, and will \w cleanse|strong="H2891"\w* them: so shall they be my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and I will be their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \add shall be\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over them; and they all shall have \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*: they shall also \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them.

And they shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, wherein your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w*; and they shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein, \add even\add* they, and their \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, and their \w children’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: and my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \add shall be\add* their \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

Moreover I will \w make|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* with them; it shall be an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with them: and I will \w place|strong="H5414"\w* them, and \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* them, and will \w set|strong="H5414"\w* my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of them for \w evermore|strong="H5769"\w*.
My \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* also shall be with them: yea, I will be their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and they shall be my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* do \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, when my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* shall be in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of them for \w evermore|strong="H5769"\w*.
